report.title: Pain is Managable
report.author: Don
report.bodytext: As I read these reports, I see a lot of people looking for a buzz! /n /n I suffer chronic neck pain and have had two surgeries with only minimal success. I've been looking for alternatives to prescription drugs and think I may have hit on something. I've just finished two cups of tea made with a total of 3 tablespoons of dried plant. I feel very relaxed and the pain is very managable. /n /n I am thinking of combining this tea with a cold infusion of kava. Next time.
